author: Sam Raskin
title: EU boxing Russia in by barring from airspace, sending weapons, resources to Ukraine
description: The European Union will bar Russian airlines from its airspace as it sends weapons and resources to Ukraine in a ramped up response to Russia’s war.
content: The European Union will bar Russian airlines from its airspace as it sends weapons and resources to Ukraine in a historic response to Russias war on its western neighbor, international officials said… [+6533 chars]
